articles.author: Anna Tong, Peter Henderson
articles.title: San Francisco patches over homelessness, drug-abuse for APEC - Reuters
articles.description: On a sunny Sunday before world leaders were scheduled to gather for the Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) forum, the United Nations Plaza, one of the epicenters of San Francisco's drugs and homelessness crisis, wore a festive air.
articles.content: SAN FRANCISCO, Nov 14 (Reuters) - On a sunny Sunday before world leaders were scheduled to gather for the Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) forum, the United Nations Plaza, one of the epicente… [+4030 chars]
